"Would you like to nickname the captured REFERENCE?"

"thanks" "good guide" 

Waste of time; free RP bulldust. 

Riot, can't we just chat-ban these guys from posting comments? I know they're all just worthless quick, free accounts, but we've got to do something to get rid of this spam...

Thanks for highlighting this for us. We're always on the lookout for spam/scam links in comments. We delete them whenever we see them, and permanently ban the posters - like the one you replied to!

Please keep calling out scams when you see them to let other players know. It's a really good service to the community!

{{champion:86}}
Why do riot keep on making champs so quickly these days! makes me cri{{item:3070}} {{champion:83}}
I don't pretty understand the changing for Mordekaiser's W, could anyone explain to me a bit?
He gains half the amount as before.
The passive on Morde's W was that he gained 100% of the experience in a lane, even if there were nearby allies. Now it's not the case.

Due to how Veigar always has so much AP later on that the base damage increase in his abilities barely do anything, I think the scaling should be increased in Q but not W to make last hitting easier for newer players, if they put their ranks into Q instead of being annoying and having a super low cooldown E by level 8.

In other words: due to how small base damage is compared to AP damage, Veigar can have high base damage at 5 ranks but terrible base damage at 1 without being affected in his power when he's stacked AP, it simply lets Veigar players have more choice by maxing Q for easier last hitting instead of E for more engages which people find really annoying.

And support Veigar would be fun to play well.
